message.content:
cs.MA, cs.AI, cs.LG, cs.SY, cs.DC 

The paper presents a framework for solving coordination problems among a multitude of agents using a semi-decentralized model, which is a common topic in the field of multi-agent systems (MAS). Therefore, cs.MA (Multiagent Systems) is the most likely sub-category. The paper also uses deep reinforcement learning (DRL) techniques, which are commonly used in the sub-categories of cs.AI (Artificial Intelligence) and cs.LG (Machine Learning). The paper also deals with control and scheduling problems, which are relevant to the sub-categories of cs.SY (Systems and Control) and cs.DC (Distributed, Parallel, and Cluster Computing).
